title: Mount Rushmore National Memorial: Learn About the Park
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park           Learn About the Park            News Read the most recent and archived releases as well as the park newspaper.           Photos and Multimedia View modern and historic images of Mount Rushmore and it's surroundings.           History and Culture Explore some of Mount Rushmore's stories and the people that made the memorial possible.           Nature Learn more about the natural features found here.           Education Download lesson plans, bring a park ranger to your classroom or schedule a field trip.           Kids and Youth Find activities for younger visitors and information about the Junior Ranger program.           Management Keep up with park planning, policies and statistics.           Bookstore Shop here and support a variety of park programs.
